columns.name: distributor
columns.description: The distributor of the product. Contact the product administrator for the significance of this value.

columns.name: full_text_search
columns.description: The full text for the product.

columns.name: has_default_path
columns.description: Indicates whether the product has a default path. If the product does not have a default path, call ListLaunchPaths to disambiguate between paths.

columns.name: owner
columns.description: The owner of the product. Contact the product administrator for the significance of this value.

columns.name: support_description
columns.description: The description of the support for this product.

columns.name: support_email
columns.description: The email contact information to obtain support for this product.

columns.name: support_url
columns.description: The URL information to obtain support for this product.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The product type. Contact the product administrator for the significance of this value. If this value is MARKETPLACE, the product was created by Amazon Web Services Marketplace.

columns.name: launch_paths
columns.description: Information about the associated launch paths.

columns.name: provisioning_artifacts
columns.description: Information about the provisioning artifacts for the specified product.
